items.description: NotificationChannel represents a single Notification Channel.

enabled.description:
BooleanFlag represent a command to enable some boolean property (set to true),
disable some boolean property (set to false), or avoid changing that property.

 - DO_NOT_CHANGE: Do not change boolean property. Default value.
 - ENABLE: Enable boolean property.
 - DISABLE: Disable boolean property.

for.description: Rule set duration. Zero value will not change it.

params.description: Parameters to change. Missing parameters will not be changed.

items.description: Param repsesents a single Integrated Alerting rule parameter change.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result.

post.summary: ListAlertRules returns a list of all Integrated Alerting rules.

reload.description: If true, Integrated Alerting rule files will be re-read from disk.

items.description: Param repsesents a single template parameter.

float.description: FloatParam represents float parameter's default value and valid range.

default.description: Default value if has_default is true.

has_default.description: True if default value is set.

has_max.description: True if maximal valid value is set.

has_min.description: True if minimal valid value is set.

max.description: Maximal valid value (inclusive) if has_max is true.

min.description: Minimal valid value (inclusive) if has_min is true.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result.

template.description: Template represents Alert Template that is used to create Alert Rule.
